title: Earthing
fullText:
The system of protective earthing in the electrical installation shall be a MEN system in accordance with Section 5.
Exception: Where the output of the electricity generation system does not exceed 25 kVA, the output may be arranged as a separated supply, in accordance with the requirements of Clause 7.4.
Any exposed conductive parts of the electricity generation system shall be earthed by connection to the main earthing conductor at the main switchboard.
